[docs]@jit(nopython=True, fastmath=True)
def pr_sigmoid(x):
    return 1./(1. + np.exp(-x))




[docs]@jit(nopython=True, fastmath=True)
def pr_softmax(x, axis=0):
    x_exp = np.exp(x)
    return x_exp/np.sum(x_exp, axis=axis)
